questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of this footwear?
What is the dominant color displayed across the majority of the shoe's upper?
Focusing on the material, what texture is apparent on the shoe's main body?
What color are the contrasting stripes visually present on the side of the shoe?
Describe the color of the secondary accent stripes located adjacent to the green stripes?
What material appears to comprise the sole of the sneaker, exhibiting a smooth surface?
Considering the overall structure, what is the style of the lacing system implemented?
Looking at the construction, how would you describe the height of the shoe's profile?
What is the apparent color of the midsole, situated between the outsole and upper?
What kind of stitching is visibly used to secure the upper material to the sole unit?
Observe the heel counter; what is its main color?
Describe the pattern of the stripes on the side of the shoe; are they solid or patterned?
What is the texture of the toe cap region, in relation to the rest of the upper?
What appears to be the material of the eyelets through which the laces are threaded?
Examine the outsole; is the tread pattern prominent or subtle?
